timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description:
Your last ticket was created `{m} minutes` and `{s} seconds` ago.
Please wait before creating your next Ticket.

created.title: We got your Ticket
created.description: You will find your ticket <#{channelid}> under the `Support` category.

info-message.title: Support Ticket #{ticketnumber}
info-message.description:
Hi <@{userid}>,
Please take a moment to describe the issue you're facing.
The more details you provide, the better we can assist you.
If applicable, include error messages, steps to reproduce the problem, and any other relevant information.

error-timeout.title: Code expired
error-timeout.description: This code is expired. Use /open-contributor to get a new one.

error-similar-inquiry.title: Request canceled
error-similar-inquiry.description: It appears that a similar inquiry or request has already been submitted elsewhere, as a result, the current request has been canceled.

error-already-has-role.title: Well... you are an Open Contributor
error-already-has-role.description: You already are an Open Contributor. There is no need to use this command.

initial-message.title: How to become an Open Contributor
initial-message.description:
For becoming an Open Contributor and its roles you must fulfill the following things:

1. Have {neededcommits} or more commits
2. Have {neededpr} or more pull requests

Click the link button and check if you can become an Open Contributor.

results-complete.title: Github Results

results-not-complete.title: Github Results

results-no-data.title: Github Results for {githubname}
results-no-data.description: You got no commits nor pull request's.

list.title: These links might interest you!
list.description:
Our Github: [Code0 Github](https://github.com/code0-tech)

Our Website: [Code0 Website](https://code0.tech)

info.title: How to become an Open Contributor
info.description:
To be an Open Contributor, meet these criteria:

1. Have {neededcommits} or more commits.
2. Have {neededpr} or more pull requests.

You can check or get the role by using `/open-contributer` command.

own-rank-response.description:
### Level: {level}
{progressbar} [{xp} xp|{neededXp} xp]

You <@{rankuserid}> are currently on the {position} place.
Earn XP by interacting on this server with others.

this-bot-rank.description:
### Well, I'm not really into collecting XP.
Maybe try a `user` and not a Bot like me c:

new-application.title: Application Channel Created
new-application.description: A new application channel has been created for you: <#{channelid}>.

has-application.title: Existing Application Channel Found
has-application.description: Sorry, but you can only have one application channel at a time.

application-message.title: Apply Here
application-message.description: Here you can apply and communicate with our staff to get involved with Code0.
